title: Water leakage in bathroom
body: There is a strong water leak near the sink. The flow is constant and the floor is wet.
author: marco

title: Computer not turning on
body: The pc does not start even when pressing the power button. Possible hardware error or power failure.
author: luca

title: Payment error at the front desk
body: Customer attempted to pay twice. The system showed a payent eror and the card was rejected.
author: giulia

title: Broken pipe behind the wall
body: We suspect a pipe bursts because water pressure is low and a strange noise comes from the kitchen wall.
author: andrea

title: Severe internet lag
body: Internet connection drops every few minutes. Multiple users report poor connection and slow loading.
author: francesca

title: Dangerous exposed cables
body: Several electrical cables are visible in the hallway. This is dangerous and could cause an accident.
author: marco

title: Heating not working
body: Room temperature is very low. The heating system seems to be broken since yesterday evening.
author: luca

title: Layout misalignment on display
body: The dashboard layout is shifted to the left. Buttons overlap making navigation annoying.
author: giulia

title: Fire alarm false trigger
body: The fire alarm activated without any smoke or heat. Possible sensor error or malfunction.
author: andrea

title: Bathroom door not closing
body: The bathroom door is misaligned and does not close properly. Requires adjustment or replacement.
author: francesca
